name: Turritopsis
description:
Click on Polyp to start children spawn, Click&Drag over a adult jelly fish to give it an impulse, double click on adult to shapeshift it to his natural rejuvenate state. You've got it; it's an eternal cycle of life. Beware of submarine threats.

Ludum Dare 35

- Inspired by real facts - They are already eternal, help them spreading all seas.

A game by
Anne Abile-Gal - story design
Constance Joliff - graphic design
Matthieu Lechowski - music
Olivier Gilquin - dev
